title: Calories in Costco Croissant
meta_description: Learn calories in croissant costco: a plain butter croissant packs ~360 kcal, with carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition details inside.
assumptions: Plain butter croissant from Costco bakery, ~70 g, fresh-baked with standard ingredients; no fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, size, and exact recipe; Costco values may differ slightly. Check packaging or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Costco plain croissant provides ~360 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Costco croissant?
faqs.a: About 360 kcal for one plain butter croissant.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Costco croissant?
faqs.a: Roughly 42 g total carbs, with 1 g fiber and 6 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Costco croissant high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~20 g total fat, including 10 g saturated fat per croissant.

faqs.q: How much protein in calories in croissant costco?
faqs.a: Around 6 g protein per plain Costco croissant.

faqs.q: Do Costco croissants vary in calories by type?
faqs.a: Yes—plain is ~360 kcal; filled varieties like almond or chocolate add 60–140 kcal.
